check(bytes32).details: Evaluates the obfuscated circuit with the given input      WARNING: Do not use this on-chain before committing!

params.input: The candidate value (e.g., private key, preimage)

returns.success: True if input matches the embedded secret

commit(bytes32).details: The commit hash MUST be keccak256(abi.encode(msg.sender, input))      This binds the commitment to your address, preventing front-running

returns.blockNumber: The block when committed (0 if none)

reveal(bytes32).details: Must wait COMMIT_DELAY blocks after commit before revealing      Verifies: keccak256(abi.encode(msg.sender, input)) == commitHash

params.input: The secret value that satisfies the obfuscated circuit

check(bytes32).notice: Check if input matches the obfuscated secret (view only)

commit(bytes32).notice: Commit to a claim attempt (phase 1 of commit-reveal)

commitDelay().notice: Get the minimum blocks between commit and reveal

encryptedGates().notice: Get the number of encrypted gates in this honeypot

estimatedGas().notice: Get estimated gas cost for reveal() call

getCommit(address).notice: Get commitment info for an address

reveal(bytes32).notice: Reveal and claim the reward (phase 2 of commit-reveal)
